title: Morisons
description:
The data being visualised here is the location of Morisons stores. The height of each pixel represents the distance to the closest Morisons store as the crow flies.

The location of the Morisons stores were scraped from the API that powers the Morisons Storefinder (https://my.morrisons.com/storefinder). The API was last scraped for updates on 31st May 2021. For more information, the source code that created this dataset is here https://github.com/jamesHargreaves12/DataVis_python.
